Sentencas: Yttrium stabilized zirconium (YSZ - (Y(2)O(3))(0.08)(ZrO(2))(0.92)) thin films were formed by e-beam evaporation technique.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The powders of different surface areas were used to prepare thin ceramic films.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The influence of the initial powder material on formed thin films electrical and microstructure properties was studied.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: YSZ thin films were deposited on two types of substrates: optical quartz (SiO(2)) and Alloy 600 (Fe-Ni-Cr) substrates.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: Deposition rate was changed from 2 to 16 angstrom/s to test its influence on thin film formation and properties.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: Electrical parameters of YSZ thin ceramics were investigated in the frequency range from 0.1 to 1.0 MHz in temperature range from 473 to 873 K.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The conductivity of the electrolyte YSZ-8 thin films was determined by impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The formed YSZ films repeat the crystallographic orientation of the initial powder material and do not depend on the powder grain size.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: It was determined that the deposition rate has influence on the crystallite size.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: Initial powder grain size and deposition rate influence the relative density of formed YSZ thin films.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of formed films depends on the grain size of initial powder, also.
Titulo: Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique
Influence of initial powder particle size on yttrium stabilized zirconium thin films formed by e-beam technique
